title: Introduction to FinnaR
text: vignette provides overview use FinnaR package…
code: library(FinnaR) record <- search_finna("sibelius") print(record) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 Sibelius favourites : … Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA     ##  2 Sibelius                Tappe… 1967  NA       Taidet… NA       Jyväsk… NA     ##  3 Sibelius                Favén… NA    NA       Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… NA     ##  4 Sibelius                Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… NA     ##  5 Sibelius                Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Eepos-… NA     ##  6 SIBELIUS                TÖRNE… 1945  fin      Kirja,… SIBELIU… Helle-… NA     ##  7 Sibelius                Lampi… 1995  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ##  8 Sibelius                Lampi… 2005  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ##  9 Sibelius                Lampi… 1984  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ## 10 Sibelius                Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows

title: Introduction to FinnaR
text: Example 2

: sosiaalipoli… Karis… 2000  fin      Kirja,… kirjoit… Helka-… Työra… ##  4 [Kirja-arvostelu]       Karis… 2000  fin      Lehti/… Lehtola… Kansal… NA     ##  5 Lahden, Kariston ja va… Hiila… 2016  fin      Kirja,… Karisto… Itä-Su… NA     ##  6 Maukas gradu : valmist… Karis… 2004  fin      Kirja,… researc… 3AMK-k… NA     ##  7 [Kirja-arvostelu:Mauka… Kuusi… 2004  fin      Lehti/… Karisto… Kansal… NA     ##  8 [Kirja-arvostelu:Mauka… Ahpon… 2004  fin      Lehti/… Karisto… Kansal… NA     ##  9 Topi karkuteillä        Seppä… 2011  fin      Kirja,… Topi,, … Anders… Koira… ## 10 Topi löytöretkillä      Seppä… 2009  fin      Kirja,… Siru,, … Anders… Koira… ## # ℹ 90 more rows

text: devel version FinnnaR can installed GitHub follows:
code: # Install FinnaR if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("FinnaR", quietly = TRUE)) {   remotes::install_github("ake123/FinnaR") } remotes::install_github("ake123/FinnaR")

title: R package for Finna API (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic functionality FinnaR can explored follows:
code: # Load the package library(FinnaR) # Perform a simple search and print a table  record <- search_finna("sibelius") head(record) record <- search_finna("sibelius", sort = "main_date_str des") head(record)

what: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: function retrieves multiple Finna records based vector record IDs. can specify fields return, language, pagination options.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: get_finna_records(   ids,   field = NULL,   prettyPrint = FALSE,   lng = "fi",   page = 1,   limit = 100 )

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: ids vector record IDs retrieve. field vector fields return. Defaults NULL, returns default fields. prettyPrint Logical; whether pretty-print response. Defaults FALSE. lng Language returned translated strings. Defaults "fi". page page number retrieve. Defaults 1. limit number records return per page. Defaults 20.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: list containing retrieved records data.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: records <- get_finna_records("fikka.3405646", field = "title", prettyPrint = TRUE, lng = "en-gb") print(records) #> # A tibble: 1 × 8 #>   Title               Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series #>   <chr>               <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  #> 1 Uimaveden puhdistus NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA

what: Finna Index Search with Advanced Options — search_finna
title: Finna Index Search with Advanced Options — search_finna
text: function performs search Finna index extended options, allowing wide range search types, filters, facets, sorting methods.

title: Finna Index Search with Advanced Options — search_finna
code: search_finna(   lookfor,   type = "AllFields",   fields = NULL,   filters = NULL,   facets = NULL,   facetFilters = NULL,   sort = "relevance,id asc",   page = 1,   limit = 100,   lng = "fi",   prettyPrint = FALSE )

title: Finna Index Search with Advanced Options — search_finna
text: lookfor string containing search terms. Boolean operators (, , ) can included. type string specifying type search. Options include "AllFields", "Title", "Author", "Subject". Defaults "AllFields". fields vector fields returned search results. Defaults NULL, returns standard set fields. filters vector filter queries refine search. Defaults NULL. facets vector specifying facets return results. Defaults NULL. facetFilters vector regular expressions filter facets. Defaults NULL. sort string defining sort order results. Options include: "relevance,id asc" (default) "main_date_str desc" (Year, newest first) "main_date_str asc" (Year, oldest first) "last_indexed desc" (Last modified) "first_indexed desc" (Last added) "callnumber,id asc" (Classmark) "author,id asc" (Author) "title,id asc" (Title) page integer indicating page number results retrieve. Defaults 1. limit integer specifying number records return per page. Defaults 20. lng string language returned translated strings. Options "fi", "en-gb", "sv", "se". Defaults "fi". prettyPrint logical value indicating whether pretty-print JSON response. Useful debugging. Defaults FALSE.

title: Finna Index Search with Advanced Options — search_finna
text: tibble containing search results relevant fields extracted. Returns NULL search fails input invalid.

title: Finna Index Search with Advanced Options — search_finna
code: search_results <- search_finna("sibelius", sort = "main_date_str desc") print(search_results) #> # A tibble: 100 × 8 #>    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series #>    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  #>  1 He selvisivät sodasta   Kirve… 2024  fin      Kirja,… sotilaa… Anders… NA     #>  2 Yli-ihmisiä ja traagis… Frost… 2024  fin      Kirja,… Wagner,… Helka-… NA     #>  3 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  fin      Kirja,… Järnefe… Anders… Atene… #>  4 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  swe      Kirja,… Järnefe… Helle-… Atene… #>  5 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  eng      Kirja,… Järnefe… Helmet… Atene… #>  6 Solace                  NA     2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Anders… NA     #>  7 Laulun juhlaa           Klas,… 2024  fin      Äänite… 2020-lu… Helmet… NA     #>  8 Solace                  Sibel… 2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Taidey… NA     #>  9 A gardener's world : f… Fishe… 2024  eng      Äänite… NA       Anders… NA     #> 10 Sibelius, Prokofiev 1,… Janse… 2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Eepos-… NA     #> # ℹ 90 more rows
